|brand = CradlePoint |model = CTR350 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = mobile hotspot |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = UXX-CTR350 |icid = 6921A-CTR350 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Ubicom;IP3023; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Ubicom 32 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 250/325 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Eon;EN29LV320B-70TP; |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = Mira;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:30:44 |oui = 00:30:44
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = 3G capable |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = CTR-XXX |defaultssid_regex = ^CTR-[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = U-MEDIA |manuf_model = WAP-210U |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/06/2007 |estreldate = 2008 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 094922814722 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B001FWH0A0 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = U-MEDIA WMD-201A |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR2413A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WAP-210U" and "Rev:UB" appears to be silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"WMD-201A Rev.UA" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
The FCC photos show the device with a '''Mira''' P2V64S4... RAM chip (likely P2V64S40DTP or P2V64S40ETP, 8MB).
The default password is the last 6 characters of the MAC address.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
